page.title: 04Land ownership
page.content: { Weston Mill}is the largest family business in the area, with its offices and most buildings at{Mill Farm.} There are 5 different farm properties involved, two of which, Mill Farm and{ {Crow Park Farm}are in the survey area. The entire business is run by 8 full-time workers plus office staff, with casual labour at busy times. Many of the roads on Weston Mill properties are gated and signposted as private roads, and members of the public may not use them without permission. All the smaller farms in the area are owned and worked by family units. For most of the time the family runs the farm without outside help, but at busy times they may have extra labour. These farms often have to hire their larger machinery at harvest time, possibly using one of the 5 combines owned by Weston Mill.
